transcript: There's nothing to it become down here the fish arrive they flop around they do their fish thing we go Oh, look at the fish. Let me go home

segments.text: There's nothing to it become down here the fish arrive they flop around they do their fish thing we go
Oh, look at the fish. Let me go home

metadata.transcript_ground_truth: There is nothing to it; we come down here, the fish arrive, they flop around, they do their fish thing.  We go ooh, ah, look at the fish and we go home.
